title: Sasheer Knows Rappers Have Problems Too
description:
Sasheer! Nicole! This week, we are discussing Nicole’s recent singing lessons, why Sasheer hasn’t been listening to the newest Beyonce album, Sasheer’s gift to Nicole on Jimmy Kimmel (Check it out here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qVLGSn7xdv8), how Clyde is a rambunctious scoundrel, Nicole’s tooth drama, and is Sasheer scary? They take a quiz to see what their first impression is, hear from a listener on going sans-underwear in leggings, and answer listener questions about how to make time for friends and dealing with a roommate with different covid comfort levels. 

 

Here is the quiz from this week: https://www.horoscope.com/us/games/quiz/game-quiz-what-first-impression-do-you-give.aspx

 

Email or call Nicole & Sasheer with your friendship questions at:

nicoleandsasheer@gmail.com

424-645-7003
author: fanmail+bestfriends@earwolf.com (Earwolf)
